name: Big Cock Simulator
description:
An ultimate chicken-male specimen simulator.
Attack the city, protecc chickens, cause chaos, fight gigantic bosses, be a rooster and save the world

Features:

-Deep plot

-Kill dem humans

-Be a chicken male specimen

-Do the rooster sound

-Destroy buildings

-Fight the ChickenZilla

-A big city to explore

-Beautiful graphics

-Third and First Person View

Game by CockStar North
